name: Longevity Zero to One: Longevity Landscape / Industry
description:
Session 3: Longevity Landscape / Industry


This session provides an overview of different players in longevity, the roles they play, how they help and how they fall short. 


Topics:

- Academia

- NGOs

- Governments

- Pharma

- Startups

- Funding


About the course


Longevity Zero to One is a course designed to get you from zero biology to a general understanding of the intervention landscape and bottlenecks to progress. We on helping participants apply their existing skillsets to high-impact areas in longevity.


Attending all sessions is highly recommended.


If you donâ€™t have a biology background, we highly recommend attending the 1st session (General Biology) and 2nd session (Aging Biology). If you do have a background in biology, feel free to skip the 1st session!
